verses.name: Ezra 4:3
verses.text: But Zerubbabel, and Jeshua, and the rest of the chief of the fathers of Israel, said unto them, Ye have nothing to do with us to build an house unto our God; but we ourselves together will build unto the Lord God of Israel, as king Cyrus the king of Persia hath commanded us.

verses.name: Ezra 4:4
verses.text: Then the people of the land weakened the hands of the people of Judah, and troubled them in building,

verses.name: Ezra 4:5
verses.text: And hired counsellors against them, to frustrate their purpose, all the days of Cyrus king of Persia, even until the reign of Darius king of Persia.
